title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix in the grated parmesan.
Mix the cooked spaghetti with the pancetta.
Remove from heat and stir in the egg and cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.
